snippet: David Meyers is chief of Smartbox North America, which provides gift vouchers for dining, spas, travel and other leisure activities. His wife, Barbra, believes strongly in the power of crystals.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Smartbox North America chief David Meyers discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: David Meyers is chief of Smartbox North America, which provides gift vouchers for dining, spas, travel and other leisure activities. His wife, Barbra, believes strongly in the power of crystals.

headline.seo: A Remedy for Jet Lag, but No Help With Airport Security
headline.main: A Jet Lag Cure New to Airport Security
headline.print_headline: A Jet Lag Cure New to Airport Security
